title: HoP 324 - United We Fall - Latin Philosophy in Byzantium
itunes:title: HoP 324 - United We Fall - Latin Philosophy in Byzantium
description: Thomas Aquinas finds avid readers among Byzantines at the twilight of empire, and is used by both sides of the Hesychast controversy.
